attributes.action: Overturn the mandate for care staff to be vaccinated against covid in the UK
attributes.additional_details: To give care staff the right to make their own health choices, to stop an already understaffed sector falling under and to save our services users/clients from being neglected due to lack of staff and care!
attributes.background: Respect individual choice and human rights by Overturning the decision to make covid vaccines mandatory for care home staff.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577842
